user_question: What are some creative ways to incorporate mindfulness into a daily routine?
final_answer: Some creative ways to incorporate mindfulness into a daily routine include mindful walking, using a mindfulness app during breaks, practicing gratitude journaling, incorporating mindful eating, and setting a daily intention.
